title: On my Google Pixel 2 XL phone, notifications from gmail or whatsapp either do not come at all or do
content:
Issue: Notifications on gmail or whatsapp do not come consistently when phone is in locked condition. When phone is unlocked and gmail or whatsapp is opened, all items download.
Phone has been checked at Google service centre in Mumbai and also factory reset has been done several times but to no avail. 
Not getting a notification immediately (even when phone is locked, causes great inconvenience as I am unable to respond to urgent requests.
